Banner.Description: I am a passionate software engineering graduate from ESPRIT, with solid experience in web, mobile, and DevOps development. I design high-performance applications using Spring Boot, Angular, and Flutter, while adopting a modern approach based on continuous integration and deployment.
AboutMe.Title: About Me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: I am Mohamed Habib Dhaouadi, a software engineer with a passion for creating innovative digital solutions. My journey has allowed me to gain versatile expertise in web, mobile, and DevOps technologies.
I have worked on diverse projects ranging from appointment management platforms to advanced DevOps applications, digital health, and data visualization.
I master tools such as Docker, Jenkins, Kubernetes, SonarQube, and I follow an agile approach based on Scrum.
My goals: build robust, scalable, secure, and user-centered applications.
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Fullstack & DevOps Intern
Description: Development of an appointment management platform using Angular, Spring Boot, and Flutter
Implementation of complex features (notifications, calendars, complaints...)
CI/CD integration with Docker, Kubernetes, Jenkins, and SonarQube
Performance testing with JMeter and code quality with Sonar

Experience.Jobs.Title: Web Intern
Description: Design of a web application to improve 4G network quality

Experience.Jobs.Title: Web Developer Intern
Description: Participation in a digital health project for managing medical data

FeatureProjects.Title: Featured Projects
FeatureProjects.Label: Highlighted Project

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Ski Station
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Implementation of a CI/CD pipeline with Jenkins for a Spring Boot application containerized with Docker. Monitoring with Grafana and code analysis with SonarQube.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Real Estate Project
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Web application for centralizing real estate offers with price analysis based on location and time. Angular interface with Spring Boot backend.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: WeProvide
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Cross-platform application (web, desktop, mobile) for managing rentals, services, and restaurants. Built with Symfony, Java, Codename One, and MySQL.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Obstacle Avoidance Robot
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Development of an autonomous robot capable of avoiding obstacles using an Arduino system programmed in C++.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: UnitTest
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: I developed a suite of unit and integration tests for a contract and plan management module in Spring Boot, using Mockito to simulate dependencies and ensure the reliability of CRUD operations and business logic.

OtherProjects.Title: Other Projects

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Smart Appointment
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Appointment management application developed with Spring Boot, Angular, and Flutter. It enables user management, appointment booking and tracking, automatic notifications, as well as a complaints module. The project also integrates DevOps practices with Docker, Kubernetes, and Jenkins.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Mobile Appointment
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Cross-platform mobile application developed with Flutter, connected to a Spring Boot backend, allowing appointment and schedule management. It provides an optimized user experience with real-time notifications.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Real Estate
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Real estate management web application developed with Spring Boot and Angular. It centralizes property offers, allows analysis and comparison, and includes a price forecasting module by zone, time, and location to help users in decision-making.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Android Real Estate Project
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Personal project of a mobile application developed with Android Studio for managing and visualizing real estate properties. Built with Java/Kotlin and SQLite, with notifications and interactive features.

Contact.Title: Let's Get in Touch
Contact.Content: I am seeking full-time opportunities to contribute to innovative projects. Feel free to contact me if my profile interests you.
